name: Niqlow
tagline: design, solve and estimate discrete dynamic programs.
body:
niqlow has 3 components that work together or separately:

  • DDP: Derived Dynamic Programs
  • FiveO: Object-Oriented Objective Optimization in Ox.
  • CFMPI: An interface to the MPI library.

Obtaining through git

$ cd ferrall/niqlow
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout

Authors and Contributors

  • niqlow was created by Christopher Ferrall (@ferrall).
  • niqlow is written in Ox by Jurgen Doornik.
  • Documentation is produced using OxDoc by Yori Zwols (@yozw)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
